interpretation: The Face Exhaling card represents a release of tension and stress. It signifies the moment when we finally let go of something that has been weighing heavily on us. This card encourages us to take a deep breath and let it all out, allowing us to move forward with a clear mind and a lighter heart. It can also indicate a sense of relief or surprise after a tense situation. Associated keywords include release, letting go, exhale, relief, surprise, and catharsis. This card reminds us that it is important to take care of ourselves by acknowledging and releasing negative emotions.
